title: Clear night city driving, almost stopped, 26 braking events
caption: A blue car drives on a city street at night, with many other cars and pedestrians around.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.1 m/s). There are 26 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a one-way city street with tall buildings on both sides. There are many other cars driving on the street, some of them are parked on the side of the road. The traffic light is green, and there are several pedestrians walking on the sidewalk. The weather is clear and dark, with a few streetlights illuminating the road.
reasoning: The blue car is driving slowly because of the many other cars and pedestrians on the road. It is also braking frequently to avoid collisions and maintain a safe distance from the vehicles ahead. The driver is being cautious and attentive to the surroundings, adjusting the speed and direction according to the traffic conditions.
